TEXT.BODY: Six months to December 31 SHR 8.8 cts vs 0.5 ct Interim dividend 12.5 cts vs nil Group net 9.5 mln ringgit vs 0.6 mln Pre-tax 11 mln vs 1.1 mln Turnover 88.9 mln vs 70.8 mln Note - dividend pay May 15, register April 17. REUTER
